thread.section_title: Gettington.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gettington.com | www.gettington.com
thread.title: Blanca Saucedo-Garcia

author: Blanca Saucedo-Garcia
title: Blanca Saucedo-Garcia
text:
It was such a quick process to order and have the delivery date set. The tv was on sale and we got a great deal on it. The only down side is how after spending over $500 on an item, we are still forced to pay for shipping. There's only a "free shipping" coupon for 1st time buyers. Not for good established customers. That was a huge deferent to continue to order from Gettington.
A week later I received a coupon for free shipping and they refused to apply it or make an exception. Just a bit disappointing. Other than that, the delivery company they used was great at contacting me and setting a delivery time. They were very professional.
